author: SkinnyTaste
name: Peach Pie Cottage Cheese Bowls
instructions: Heat a small skillet over medium heat and spray lightly with oil. Add the peaches, brown sugar, and cinnamon and mix to combine. Leave undisturbed and cook for 1 minute. Mix and cook an additional minute. Transfer to bowl or plate and allow to cool for 5 minutes. Scoop 1 cup of cottage cheese into 2 bowls. Top each bowl with ½ the peaches and 1 tablespoon each of pistachios. Drizzle with honey, if desired.
